lead_paragraph: Like many indictments, the facts Mr. Christie presented to Republican delegates were selective: not necessarily false, but often ignoring exculpatory evidence.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and DAVID E. SANGER

headline.main: Chris Christie Made a Case Against Hillary Clinton. We Fact-Checked.

snippet: Like many indictments, the facts Mr. Christie presented to Republican delegates were selective: not necessarily false, but often ignoring exculpatory evidence....
